<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Incredible Luck (Halfling)](/Feats.aspx?ID=1023) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Halfling" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=87" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 45 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Halfling Luck](/Feats.aspx?ID=54)

</column>

---

Even other halflings consider you to be particularly lucky. You can use Halfling Luck once per hour, rather than once per day. If you have [Guiding Luck](/Feats.aspx?ID=62), you can still use Halfling Luck when you fail a Perception check or attack roll only once per day (though you can use it within the same hour that you used Halfling Luck), and if you have [Shared Luck](/Feats.aspx?ID=1018), you can still use Halfling Luck on an ally instead of yourself only once per day.
name: Incredible Luck (Halfling)
